_header: Abide I hope it be the best
_description: Think before you act — five 2-line stanzas and 4-line burden: ‘Abyde Y hope hit be the beste [repeated twice] / Sith hasty man lakked neuer woo’

BodArcSelB26.First Lines:
AByde y hope hit be þe besteSith hasty man lakked neuer
                    woo…
BodArcSelB26.Last Lines:
…ffor longe tyme ȝour hert shal bresteAbyde y consayl
                    ȝow do soo

         London: Leadenhall Press; New York: Scribner’s, 1891: 19.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 231; 1977, 206.
Stevens,  John,
                        ed.  
             Mediaeval Carols.
Musica Britannica
         4. London: Stainer and Bell, 1952, 2nd ed. 1958: 31.

CamTCC1230.First Lines:
Abyde I hope it be þe besteSyn hasty man wantyth neuere
                    wooLat euery man þat wil han resteEuere ben auysyd qwatt he
                    schall do…
CamTCC1230.Last Lines:
…Proue er þu take þink er þu festeIn weel be
                    war er þu be woAbyde I hope it be þe besteSyn hasty man
                    wantyth neuere woo
